Tired of nicks and cuts? Same. The Bevel Pre-Shave Oil helps prepare and protect your skin from nicks, cuts, and razor bumps using a signature blend of Sunflower Seed Oil, Castor, and Olive Oils. Bevel Pre-Shave Oil creates a lubricating layer to help soften your hair and skin by holding moisture to allow your razor to smoothly glide across your skin for a smoother shave.

FOUNDATION IS EVERYTHING.

Creates a lubricating layer and softens your hair and skin by holding moisture in to reduce nicks and cuts that can create dark spots. Softer hair allows for a more comfortable cut, and softened skin helps your razor glide across your skin. This lets you apply less pressure to get a better shave.

FOR BEST USE

Start by taking a hot shower or hold a damp hot towel against your skin for at least one minute. Vigorously massage a nickel-sized amount into the skin and hair. Let this slowly absorb for a few moments before applying Shave Cream.

KEY INGREDIENTS

  • Castor Oil - Moisturizes the skin and keeps it supple, reduces inflammation, soothes irritated and itchy skin, and fights infection.
  • Sunflower Oil - Naturally soothes, reducing itching, swelling, and irritation.
  • Olive Oil - Natural moisturizer rich in Vitamin E that softens coarse and curly hairs for a tug-free shave.

MADE WITHOUT

Alcohol, Parabens, Phthalates, Sulfates, Dyes, Silicones, Artificial Fragrances

Full Ingredients

Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Fragrance, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax.
